price: Dhugumatti, Muusaa keeyyattoota keenyaafi ragaa mul'ataan ergineerra.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا مُوسَىٰ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walaqad arsalnā mūsā biāyātinā wasul'ṭānin mubīnin
